EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TE Connectivity
THANK YOU FOR ATTENDING SPS AND FOR YOUR INTEREST IN TE. Thank you for celebrating this yearâ€™s industrial engineering breakthroughs with TE Connectivity, by attending the SPS IPC Drives exhibition. We hope you enjoyed learning more about our powerful, highly efficient technologies, low- cost components and the future of smarter factories.
For a recap of the event and to learn more about each of our automation control and systems solutions, visit our SPS landing page below, where you can see video highlights and download TE white papers on ARISO Contactless Connectivity.
Find TE in: Hall 10, Booth 210
ARISO Contactless Connectivity
In our white paper, learn how TE Contactless Connectivity transmits signals, data, and power through proximity. And through water. And through walls.
